text: Californication is an American television series. The series is shown on the Showtime television network. Californication was created by Tom Kapinos and stars David Duchovny as Hank Moody. It is about a troubled novelist who moves to Los Angeles, California. The series deals with problems with his job that cause problems with his relationships with his partner Karen (Natascha McElhone) and daughter Becca (Madeleine Martin). The series was first shown on television on August 13, 2007. Channel Five in the UK and Network Ten in Australia have bought the rights to this television series. It was announced that after the seventh season, that Californication would end. The seventh season started airing on April 13, 2014. == References == == Other websites == * Showtime Announcement Category:2007 American television series debuts Category:2000s American television series Category:2010s American television series Category:2014 American television series endings Category:American drama television series Category:Television series set in Los Angeles Category:English-language television programs
title: Californication (TV series)
